law.catch_line: Testing of automatic tabulating equipment prior to election.
law.text: On any day not more than thirty (30) nor less than five (5) days prior to the election day, the county clerk shall have the automatic tabulating equipment tested in the manner prescribed by the State Board of Elections.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 421, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982.
